trans-unit.source: Track B2B messages in your logic apps in Azure App Service | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Track B2B messages in your logic apps in Azure App Service | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: This topic covers tracking of B2B processing
trans-unit.target: This topic covers tracking of B2B processing

trans-unit.source: Track B2B messages
trans-unit.target: Track B2B messages

trans-unit.source: B2B Tracking Information
trans-unit.target: B2B Tracking Information

trans-unit.source: B2B communication involves message processing between trading partners.
trans-unit.target: B2B communication involves message processing between trading partners.

trans-unit.source: The relationships are defined as agreements between two trading partners.
trans-unit.target: The relationships are defined as agreements between two trading partners.

trans-unit.source: Once the communication is established, there needs to be a way to monitor if the communication is happening as expected.
trans-unit.target: Once the communication is established, there needs to be a way to monitor if the communication is happening as expected.

trans-unit.source: We've implemented message tracking for the following B2B scenarios: AS2, EDIFACT, and X12.
trans-unit.target: We've implemented message tracking for the following B2B scenarios: AS2, EDIFACT, and X12.

trans-unit.source: AS2
trans-unit.target: AS2

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an instance of an AS2 API App, browse to that instance, and select **Tracking**.
trans-unit.target: Once you have created an instance of an AS2 API App, browse to that instance, and select **Tracking**.

trans-unit.source: Herein you can view and filter all the AS2 tracking information:
trans-unit.target: Herein you can view and filter all the AS2 tracking information:

trans-unit.source: EDIFACT
trans-unit.target: EDIFACT

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an instance of an EDIFACT API App, browse to that instance, and select **Tracking**.
trans-unit.target: Once you have created an instance of an EDIFACT API App, browse to that instance, and select **Tracking**.

trans-unit.source: Herein you can view and filter all the EDIFACT tracking information.
trans-unit.target: Herein you can view and filter all the EDIFACT tracking information.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you can view the interchange level, group level, and transaction set level data, all in a single view.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, you can view the interchange level, group level, and transaction set level data, all in a single view.

trans-unit.source: If batches are created as part of EDIFACT agreements in the associated Trading Partner Management API app, then the Batching section lists all these batches.
trans-unit.target: If batches are created as part of EDIFACT agreements in the associated Trading Partner Management API app, then the Batching section lists all these batches.

trans-unit.source: You can select a batch to see the active message (if any) and also the information for the completed:
trans-unit.target: You can select a batch to see the active message (if any) and also the information for the completed:

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an instance of an X12 API App, browse to that instance, and select **Tracking**.
trans-unit.target: Once you have created an instance of an X12 API App, browse to that instance, and select **Tracking**.

trans-unit.source: Herein you can view and filter all the X12 tracking information.
trans-unit.target: Herein you can view and filter all the X12 tracking information.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you can view the interchange level, group level, and transaction set level data, all in a single view.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, you can view the interchange level, group level, and transaction set level data, all in a single view.

trans-unit.source: If batches are created as part of X12 agreements in the associated Trading Partner Management API app, then the Batching section lists all these batches.
trans-unit.target: If batches are created as part of X12 agreements in the associated Trading Partner Management API app, then the Batching section lists all these batches.

trans-unit.source: You can select a batch to see the active message (if any) and also the information for the completed batches.
trans-unit.target: You can select a batch to see the active message (if any) and also the information for the completed batches.
